name: Doug Hartman
text:
Waste of my time. When I sat down with Jenny I told her what I was spending and what I wanted to spend per month for SEO and PPC. We spent an hour going over the company and what I have done in the past 30 years. I'm not new to the internet marketing game. I have worked with yodel and reach local and several other big players in the internet marketing. She emailed me my proposal very quickly but obviously did not listen to anything I said as her estimate was almost three times what I told her I wanted to spend per month at a total cost of over $6000. In addition to that, I was also quoted almost $15,000 for other services. While I did not use their service I feel it was a waste of my time to even meet with them.
I did receive a call under the guise of needing work done from their managing partner Nicole , asking why I left a negative review for them on Google if I did not pay them to do any work for me. I told her that I would go back on and I would modify my review so that people would understand I did not pay them but that my time was wasted in the phone calls, emails and meeting with them where obviously they did not listen to a word I had to say. This is why I left a negative review for them. They might do a wonderful job in marketing and advertising but I will never know because I will not use them.

resp.text:
Doug,

We are disappointed to hear of your frustration with our consultation process and the speediness in which we sent the proposal.

Our goal is to provide tailored strategies for every client based on their specific situation, needs, and goals. Our recommendations are always based on what we believe will specifically help your business achieve online success and may sometimes go beyond stated budgets.

We hope you're able to find a solution that is a better fit for your needs - and wish you luck in your business adventures!

Thank you for your input, your time in the call, and your revised review.

name: Doug Marshall
text:
As CFO of the Alabama Family Trust, we came to Uptick Marketing with an outdated website that was not mobile compatible, responsive, or easy to use.  In short, it needed an overhaul.  AFT is a 501c3 organization created under Alabama Statute to administer special needs trusts for children and adults with disabilities, protecting their assets in a SNT to help enable Medicaid eligibility. While this area of the law can be very complicated, the team at Uptick Marketing was invaluable in helping design our new website so that viewers could more easily navigate our website and better understand how AFT operates to serve individuals with disabilities.  Uptick provided us both the technical expertise to create the website and the marketing creativity to build it in the best way to reach those most in need of our services.

name: Tristan Hancock
text:
I have tried this out the last few days and my family life started to struggling. My newborn son is not receiving my attention as needed and my mother in law can only do so much. To make any kind of decent money I have to work 5-6 appointments a day and I cannot. I also do not feel like this is a right fit for me. Cutco seems like a great product. The one huge part of why this job is so unappealing to me is the fact that we badger and coerce people into buying the product. I understand the marketing behind it but people become so uncomfortable and easily shut down because we are constantly asking them “what about this and this price” over and over again until they are completely appalled and distressed no matter the attitude we have towards the product. These products are outrageously priced even for the value.
The pay is also unjust, we are lead to believe it’ll be “excellent” and it not. We put in all this time, effort, and energy to make next to nothing no matter the sells. This seems like a pyramid scheme. It’s completely bunco. I do not like the fact that we had to recommend friends and even family into a job we don’t even know we’ll enjoy because it “sounds great”. The fact that I did 12 hours of unpaid training as well as the hours to do much training is inequitable. It took away 12 hours from my son and family that I will never be able to get back. The 6 hours of back to back training would’ve been beneficial if we had gotten paid. I have never been so distressed, uncomfortable, disturbed and unpeeled by a job before.

I let them know that I would have to stop working Friday (my last appointment). Only one of the managers, Anna Grace Moore, acknowledged me. Due to me making my own schedule (independent contractor) I it did not interrupt their schedules or own appointments.I had an appointment today and desperately needed some assistance due to the customer wanting to get his knife engraved. I did as I was taught and reached out to my manager Anna grace. She did not answer my calls nor did the other manager Emily Rodriguez. They completely abandoned me. Wrote me off because I was of no more value to them. Please avoid working for this place.

resp.text: Tristan, thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts. While it sounds like sales isn't for you - your recount of the managers not being available when they said they should is something I will be bringing to their attention so that they can improve. As for the unpaid training - I hear you - however, we explain upfront that training is unpaid. I will be reaching out to you privately via the email address on your application to help ensure that you are paid for the qualified demos you completed. ~Stephanie

name: Lawrence Johnson
text:
I hired Profit Wise to do my business and personal account. There is still difficulty in believing the incompetence and flat-out lack of character this “firm” displayed with my accounting.

I found Ms Ashleigh Heinz to be a consistent and complete liar as far as returning phone calls and keeping due dates.

I also worked with Ms Jacqueline Harwood, who frequently would not return calls and had difficulty doing bookkeeping tasks that should have been routine.

Ms Sharon Heinz completed my tax return and said I owed over 12K in taxes. I requested a meeting to review my return with Ms Heinz. I ended up meeting with Jonathon. After going through my tax return, I ended up owing less than 2K in taxes.

Not only was I not offered an apology for the service that I received I was terminated as a client.

A first-class organization this is not. Proceed at your own risk. They will gladly collect your money beware the service.

name: Lamia Haddad`
text: This is the first year I do business with Profit Wise and for the first time I can say filing my taxes was stress free. Their employees are very welcoming (always smiling). Everyone I've dealt with was highly professional and kind. If you call when they're busy, they always call you back and address any question or concern you may have. Also when they tell you your taxes will be completed on a specific date, rest assured that they will respect you and abide by it. Jonathan was especially helpful and knowledgeable. Sharon is very professional and smart. You can tell she knows what she's doing. She's also extremely sweet and friendly which makes it a joy to do business with her. Thank you Sharon :)

resp.text: It's easy to smile when you have great clients and enjoy helping them succeed. Thanks, Lamia!

name: Thos Kite Art & Design (Thomas Kite)
text: I came to Profit wize with both my business and personal taxes because I was dissatisfied with my previous accountant. They are very professional, efficient and really helped me with my complicated tax situation. It was easy to load up docs etc to a secure share so that my personal information was never compromised. I found them to be friendly and I feel they really care about their clients. When I reviewed the returns, I was hoping I did not owe any tax but it turns out I did. So the person who worked on my taxes went back to the drawing board and found some additional credits ( I supplied him with some additional documentation). I was thrilled as he was able to get me money back on my federal return and a lower state tax bill. I feel he put in some extra effort  to make me happy. I would highly recommend them.

resp.text: Thank you! We are glad you came to us for help! We look love to watch  our clients grow, personally or in business.

She is always able to be reached by phone or email, and responds quickly with estimates. Her staff has adopted this mindset as well, as they ensure that everything from the installations to the billing process is as smooth as possible.

Frank, one of the installers, is the best in the business! He works long hours and always does our installations. We look forward to seeing him on campus, because we know that if Frank is here, it will be done right! We can always count on him to be professional and do a great job.

resp.text: Hi Shelley! You know how much I appreciate you and your kind words. It pains me that small business owners spend their advertising and marketing dollars where they are ineffective. I hear horror stories like these from potential clients on a regular basis. I always advise them, whether they hire me or not, to "do this and do that" and "ask this and ask that" BEFORE selecting their next marketing agency. There are simply too many marketing service providers that over promise and under deliver, selling services that they know are not in the best interest of their clients. Even worse, many so-called "web marketing" agencies are experienced only with "traditional" marketing such as print, radio, or television, but expanded their services into the web arena in order to survive (or be more profitable). While most of these agencies are excellent at providing "traditional" marketing services, many of them are wholly unqualified to provide any type of online marketing services. They might be able to produce a "pretty" website, but that is a far cry from what is required to implement a successful, comprehensive web marketing campaign. Thanks again for leaving a review and allowing me to vent :-), Vernon Blake - Internet Marketing Specialist

I trust them implicitly and thank them for always being available when we need them.

In this day and age, it’s so nice to be able to do business with honest, decent, upstanding folks like these.

For the 7th year in a row, we have won the TripAdvisor award for best restaurant in Prattville.
- - - -
My restaurant is off the beaten path in downtown Prattville, AL making it a challenge to attract new customers. In the past, I paid to advertise in the local newspaper, print magazines, print and Internet yellow pages and an online paid listing, with limited success. I hired Bizeeo over 2 years ago (October 2012) to market my restaurant online.

They manage my website, social media, business listings and online reviews (reputation management). Since then, growth has exceed 25% for 2 consecutive years.  Due to our success with Bizeeo Marketing, I've discontinued all other forms of advertising.

Also, this year (2015), our restaurant won TripAdvisor's Certificate of Excellence award (out of 99 restaurants). This is the 3rd year in a row we have won this award. I highly recommend Bizeeo - you can see for yourself online what they've done for us.

resp.text: Hi Mickey, we have learned so much about online marketing (we are ALWAYS learning) while maintaining your website and other web properties. The biggest take-away is for some industries (your Prattville business is an example), FAR more time and effort is devoted to marketing tasks "off" the website, like managing online reviews and promoting your brand via social media. Of course, the foundation of it all is we are fortunate enough to work with a business owner that KNOWS what customer satisfaction is all about. And... congratulations on your TripAdvisor "Certificate of Excellence" award for 2016... 4th YEAR IN A Row! And thanks for taking time to leave the nice review.

name: danny newton
text:
Used their services several times. Every single time, they tell me it will be ready at a time and date. I show up after that time to pick it up, walk in, and it is NEVER READY! THIS IS EXTREMELY FRUSTRATING. No, I do not want to return later. No I do not want to sit in the lobby and wait for you to make it happen. Have it ready when you say it will be ready.

Last time I was there the manager said, "I thought I told you it would be ready tomorrow" I proceeded to read him the email he sent to me the day before saying it would be ready. He said "oh, I'll have it in 5 minutes"

I have decided to go with another printer.

text: Always on time. Always perfect. #excellentwork

name: Nichelle Fields
text: They are great when you have a big Company name behind you, but if you are a small business owner, the service was very slow. No follow ups I had to follow up three times plus it finally took three weeks to get my order. Johnathon is not what he is cranked up to be either.

resp.text:
Wow, I am very sorry that you had a bad experience with Minuteman Press and especially with me.  I am not aware of this situation.  Please contact me at your convenience so that I may be able to resolve the issues and hopefully provide a solution that will help.
Jonathan

name: Christian Clark
text: I’ve known the CEO of relentless marketing for a few years now and he is one of the best leaders I have ever met. The culture, atmosphere and opportunity relentless marketing provides is extremely rare to find. If you’re looking for rapid advancement, competition, challenges and an empowering environment this is the place to be!

resp.text:
Christian,

We can't thank you enough for this raving feedback! Providing the best company culture and opportunity for our people is our main priority; so, thank you for expressing these sentiments in this review. We appreciate you, your kind words, and your friendship!

Best,
Management

name: Tom Gottlieb
text: Phenomenal Organization!!! Everyone working at RMC has a great vision and amazing attitude about what they do and the opportunity presented to them.  The entrepreneurial spirit is driven with a wonderful management team and the belief of success being earned.  Great environment, great culture, great people.

resp.text:
Tom,

Wow, what a fantastic review! We appreciate your taking the time to share how you feel about our business. There is no better feeling than knowing that others have recognized the work that we put into creating a company environment and culture that is team-centered and upbeat. Thank you for these kind words!

Best,
Management

name: Jazmine Bennett
text: Relentless Marketing Concepts has such a family oriented culture and it has made me feel welcomed and that I belong. I’m continually developing and growing as a leader by being surrounded by driven individuals. I can’t wait to see the rest of the limitless opportunities that this business provides!

resp.text:
Jazmine,

Your words mean more to us than we can explain. Here at Relentless Marketing Concepts, our people always come first. We work hard to provide our team members with the tools and mentorship that they need to succeed, and this review has let us know that we are on the right track. Thank you!

Best,
Management
